title.narrative: ETS Education Through Sports in Lindi Region

description.narrative: Education Through Sports in Lindi Region has raised the level of sports facilities in five (5) districts in Lindi Region within years 2010-13. The districts are Lindi municipal Lindi rural Ruangwa Liwale and Nachingwea. The statistics have shown that by im proving the sports grounds providing sports equipment educating teachers on physical education and by organizing Bonanzas and other sports activities the pupils are more active in coming to school and they perform better in their studies.There are district s in Lindi Region that have not been covered with the first 3 years of project implementation. The Regional Education Office has been closely involved in the implementation and they see the need to reach all the districts in Lindi Region. The main project activities will be primary school sports field rehabilitation in Kilwa District where 104 primary schools with approximately 40 000 pupils will receive goal posts for football and netball. The sports fields will be measured and maintained before the insta llation of the goal posts.The Physical Education Teachers in Kilwa District will be called to field maintenance seminars organized by the project. In the seminars the teachers are taught how to measure the fields and they are shown the installation of the goal posts. They are also taught the basics of some sports games. The goal is to increase the knowledge in sports and also health education so that the teachers (of which most are unqualifield PE teachers) have more knowlegde to the subject Haiba na Michez o in their school. Sports and personality has been a subject in the primary school level since 2006 but most teacher do not have a proper training to teach the subject.By educating the teachers rehabilitating the sports grounds and distributing sports equi pment to the Primary schools the knowledge in sports and health education reaches the society. ETS Lindi will cover the costs for the seminars and the goal posts (purchase of pipes and welding to the right measurements). The Ministry of education has agree d to set a sum for the districts to cover the rehabilitation of the sports grounds and transportation of the goal posts to each Primary School appointed.

Koulutusta Liikunnalla Lindin läänissä -projekti on kunnostanut alakoulujen urheilukenttiä viimeisen kolmen vuoden aikana. On tutkittu että urheilukenttiä kunnostamalla ja urheiluvälineiden saatavuutta parantamalla koulunkäynti on lisääntynyt. Pr ojektin tavoitteena on innostaa kaikki läänin lapset suorittamaan perusopetuksen. Työvälineenä tähän tavoitteeseen projekti käyttää liikuntaa ja liikuntakenttien kunnostamista sekä opettajien liikuntakasvatuksen tietotaidon lisäämistä.
